articles.title: Native Americans mourn on Thanksgiving: 'No reason to celebrate' - Fox News
articles.description: Members of Native American tribes from around New England are gathering in the seaside town where the Pilgrims settled — not to give thanks, but to mourn Indigenous people worldwide who’ve suffered centuries of racism and mistreatment
